segments.en: Linked Discourses 16
1. Kassapa
7. Advice (2nd)
Near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
segments.en: Then Venerable Mahākassapa went up to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side.

segments.pli: ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: The Buddha said to him,
“Kassapa, advise the mendicants!
Give them a Dhamma talk!

segments.pli: Ahaṃ vā, kassapa, bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ vā;
segments.en: Either you or I should advise the mendicants

segments.pli: ahaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti.
segments.en: and give them a Dhamma talk.”

segments.pli: “Dubbacā kho, bhante, etarahi bhikkhū, dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṃ.
segments.en: “Sir, the mendicants these days are hard to admonish, having qualities that make them hard to admonish. They’re impatient, and don’t take instruction respectfully.

segments.pli: Yassa kassaci, bhante, saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi kusalesu dhammesu, ottappaṃ natthi kusalesu dhammesu, vīriyaṃ natthi kusalesu dhammesu, paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.
segments.en: Sir, whoever has no faith, conscience, prudence, energy, or wisdom when it comes to skillful qualities can expect decline, not growth, in skillful qualities, whether by day or by night.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhante, kāḷapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāyateva vaṇṇena, hāyati maṇḍalena, hāyati ābhāya, hāyati ārohapariṇāhena.
segments.en: It’s like the moon in the waning fortnight. Whether by day or by night, its beauty, roundness, light, and diameter and circumference only decline.

segments.pli: Evameva kho, bhante, yassa kassaci saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu … pe …
segments.en: In the same way, whoever has no faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom when it comes to skillful qualities can expect decline, not growth, in skillful qualities, whether by day or by night.

segments.pli: paññā natthi … kusalesu dhammesu tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.

segments.en: A faithless individual is in decline.
An individual with no conscience is in decline.
An imprudent individual is in decline.
A lazy individual is in decline.
A witless individual is in decline.
An irritable individual is in decline.
A hostile individual is in decline.
When there are no mendicant advisers there is decline.

segments.pli: Yassa kassaci, bhante, saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī atthi kusalesu dhammesu, ottappaṃ atthi kusalesu dhammesu, vīriyaṃ atthi kusalesu dhammesu, paññā atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no parihāni.
segments.en: Sir, whoever has faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom when it comes to skillful qualities can expect growth, not decline, in skillful qualities, whether by day or by night.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhante, juṇhapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vaḍḍhateva vaṇṇena, vaḍḍhati maṇḍalena, vaḍḍhati ābhāya, vaḍḍhati ārohapariṇāhena.
segments.en: It’s like the moon in the waxing fortnight. Whether by day or by night, its beauty, roundness, light, and diameter and circumference only grow.

segments.pli: Evameva kho, bhante, yassa kassaci saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu …
segments.en: In the same way, whoever has faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom when it comes to skillful qualities can expect growth, not decline, in skillful qualities, whether by day or by night.

segments.pli: paññā atthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no parihāni.

segments.en: A faithful individual doesn’t decline.
An individual with a conscience doesn’t decline.
A prudent individual doesn’t decline.
An energetic individual doesn’t decline.
A wise individual doesn’t decline.
A loving individual doesn’t decline.
A kind individual doesn’t decline.
When there are mendicant advisers there is no decline.”
“Good, good, Kassapa!

segments.pli: Yassa kassaci, kassapa, saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu … pe …
segments.en: Whoever has no faith, conscience, prudence, energy, or wisdom when it comes to skillful qualities can expect decline, not growth …

segments.pli: paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.
Seyyathāpi, kassapa, kāḷapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāyateva vaṇṇena … pe …
Evameva kho, kassapa, yassa kassaci saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu … pe …
paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.

segments.en: When there are no mendicant advisers there is decline.

segments.pli: Yassa kassaci, kassapa, saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu … pe …
segments.en: Whoever has faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom when it comes to skillful qualities can expect growth, not decline …

segments.pli: paññā atthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no parihāni.
Seyyathāpi, kassapa, juṇhapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vaḍḍhateva vaṇṇena, vaḍḍhati maṇḍalena, vaḍḍhati ābhāya, vaḍḍhati ārohapariṇāhena.
Evameva kho, kassapa, yassa kassaci saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu hirī atthi …
paññā atthi kusalesu dhammesu tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu, no parihāni.

segments.en: When there are mendicant advisers there is no decline.”

sections.title: Near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove.

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha invites Kassapa to teach the mendicants, but he is reluctant, saying that the mendicants have become stubborn and their good qualities are declining.
